title: Important Update: DGFT Extends Deadline for Annual RoDTEP Returns (ARR) for FY 2023-24!
content:
# Important Update: DGFT Extends Deadline for Annual RoDTEP Returns (ARR) for FY 2023-24!

Hello everyone! Ek important update hai for all exporters. The Government has announced a further extension for filing the Annual RoDTEP Return (ARR) for Financial Year 2023-24.

Here are the key details you need to know:

*   **Public Notice Reference:** This extension has been notified vide Public Notice No. 46/2025-2026 dated February 05, 2026.
*   **Previous Due Date:** The last date for filing the ARR for FY 2023-24 was previously extended to November 30, 2025.
*   **New Due Date:** The revised deadline for filing the Annual RoDTEP Return (ARR) for FY 2023-24 is now **March 31, 2026**.
*   **Composition Fee:** A composition fee of â‚¹15,000 will be applicable for filings made under this extension, effective from the date of publication of this notice.
*   **Implications of Non-filing:** Non-filing by the extended date may lead to actions under paragraph 4.94 of the Handbook of Procedures (HBP), 2023, including the denial of RoDTEP benefits.

This extension provides a much-needed relief and additional time for exporters to ensure compliance.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://dgft.gov.in/CP/)

*Published on: 6 February 2026*
